Dec 17 (Reuters) - Abrdn PLC ABDN.L:: *ABRDN PLC - DIRECTORATE CHANGE *ABRDN PLC - THAT CATHERINE BRADLEY, CBE, WILL BE APPOINTED AS A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND A MEMBER OF AUDIT COMMITTEE ON 4 JANUARY 2022.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 17-DEC-202109:59:48.167 GMT
